EmailTemplate.name: Auto-reply notification for ISS@honeywell.com
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your case number is: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
To communicate further with regards to this inquiry, please reply to this e-mail.
We will respond to your request within one business day.
Asset Management Operations http://www.MyAerospace.com
